title: ConverZation with Bill Schlegel
description:
Bill Schlegel is the author of the Satellite Bible Atlas https://www.bibleplaces.com/satellite-bible-atlas-schlegel/

His podcast and writing can be found on his website. http://www.onegodreport.com/

Please join us on the Jacob's Ladder Discord server. https://discord.gg/T7hnBgvN
